sentences.en: A good rest will restore you to health.
sentences.cn: 好好休息一下可使你恢复健康.

sentences.en: a Victorian fireplace restored to its former glory
sentences.cn: 恢复了昔日华美的维多利亚时代的壁炉

sentences.en: And let me assure you I will use whatever force is necessary to restore order.
sentences.cn: 我向你保证，我将动用一切必要力量来恢复秩序。

sentences.en: He tried to restore some semblance of normality to their home life.
sentences.cn: 他力图使他们的家庭生活恢复正常.

sentences.en: I am confident that we can restore peace, stability and respect for the rule of law.
sentences.cn: 我相信我们能恢复和平、稳定和对法治的尊重。

sentences.en: I paused in the hall to take three deep breaths to restore my equilibrium.
sentences.cn: 我在大厅里停了一下，深吸了三口气以恢复平静。

sentences.en: initiatives to restore peace in the Middle East
sentences.cn: 恢复中东和平的倡议

sentences.en: She was hoping that the Mediterranean climate would restore her to full health.
sentences.cn: 她希望地中海的气候能使她的身体完全复原。

sentences.en: The army has recently been brought in to restore order.
sentences.cn: 最近军队被调来重整秩序。

sentences.en: The church was carefully restored after the war.
sentences.cn: 战后教堂得到了精心修复。

sentences.en: The inhabitants have voted overwhelmingly to restore the city's original name of Chemnitz.
sentences.cn: 居民以压倒多数票同意恢复该市原来的名字“开姆尼茨”。

sentences.en: The measures are intended to restore public confidence in the economy.
sentences.cn: 这些举措旨在恢复公众对经济的信心。

sentences.en: The National Guard was called in to restore order (= make people stop fighting and breaking the law ) when riots broke out.
sentences.cn: 暴乱爆发后，国民警卫队被调来恢复秩序。

sentences.en: The president will have to work hard to restore his credibility.
sentences.cn: 总统将不得不努力使公众恢复对他的信任。

sentences.en: The rash of accidental shootings underscores how difficult it will be to restore order here.
sentences.cn: 一连串的意外枪击事件凸显了恢复该地区的秩序有多困难。

sentences.en: The residents of Leningrad voted to restore the city's original name of St Petersburg.
sentences.cn: 列宁格勒市的居民投票决定恢复该市原来的名字——圣彼得堡。

sentences.en: The Security Council shall decide what measures shall be taken to restore peace and security.
sentences.cn: 安理会将决定采取何种措施来恢复和平与安全。

sentences.en: The treaty restored Okinawa to Japan.
sentences.cn: 该条约将冲绳归还给了日本。

sentences.en: Troops were sent to the islands to restore order last November.
sentences.cn: 去年11月，军队被派往这些岛屿以恢复秩序。

sentences.en: Twenty-five of his supporters petitioned him to restore the monarchy.
sentences.cn: 他的拥护者中有25个人请求他复辟。

sentences.en: We need to restore respect for the law-enforcement agencies.
sentences.cn: 我们需要重塑执法机构的声望。

to make something return to its former state or condition
